short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MY COMMUNITY ZONE is a free, digital message board. Get your latest Community News, Events, Media and Resources

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MY COMMUNITY ZONE is a free, digital message board.

Get your latest Community News, Events, Media and Resources. 

Receive only information that is relevant to you. ANYWHERE - ANYTIME.

You can personalize the content you receive by selecting which community channels you want to follow.

Join different Communities or create your own. 

Communities can be:
- Public (searchable and anyone can join); 
- Secure (searchable and member requests needs to be approved by Community Administrator); or
- Private (not searchable, members need to be invited by the Community Administrator).

MY COMMUNITY, can be used as a communicator for your school, church, estate, sport club or any other member-based organisation.

Create and edit channels to publish messages to your community.

Create, Edit and Approve Community Messages from your device.

The Communities earn advertising revenue from referred advertisers.

With built-in rights management, Communities can decide who have rights to author messages and who have rights to approve messages for publishing.
